ISSUE.TITLE: `"continue": true` in routes is not supported locally
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: In `now.json`, it is possible to set global headers by using `"continue": true`. This setup currently confuses the heck out of now-dev. ``` routes: [ { "src": "/.*", "headers": {"cache-control": "s-maxage=31536000, max-age=0"}, "continue": true }, ... ] ```
